name: Space Invaders: The Basics
description:
"Space Invaders: The Basics" it's a fairly simple project, despite it being nice, which I can say is my first project and video game in question. I actually did it in a course, and it's missing a few improvements, so I'll try to bring it next updates so that it's at least stable (probably between 1-2 updates, I don't want to dwell too much on this, I need to do more than this, LOL). 

In any case, this is definitely a trial version and it doesn't have much, so don't expect much from a simple game of shooting with a spaceship and earning points and that's it. That is all.

Thanks for reading, by the way. Important to clarify.

ah, don't forget to stop by my soundtrack that I'll leave here, in case you wanted to listen to it separately: https://skremmkarl.bandcamp.com/track/galaxy-move

yes, the game retains original sprites from the Space Invaders game. do not be scared.
